Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 30 CH1. Yearly since 2016, international artists create temporary works in dialogue with landscape and nature and present them freely accessible and free of charge throughout the Safien valley. The exhibition is accompanied by an exhibition guide including a walking map that tells visitors the exact location of the artworks and interesting facts about rural and environmental art, the Art Safiental exhibition, its individual works and the Safiental valley. The exhibition is accompanied by a rich programme of guided tours, lectures, performances and other events.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is unspecified. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Predicted. This VC is classified as Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Exogenous. completely new VC to the alps but linked to tourism, making art in the alps that is specific to the place and can be visited. The innovation is related to New products, New processes and New marketing strategies. The land use systems involved are Landscape in general. The local assets include Natural, social and cultural.
